titleStmt.title: Divers papers from the army: viz. 1. Marshall Generall Skippons speech to the army, May the 15th. 2. The answer of the army: wherein they set downe their grievances. Whereunto are added other papers of concernment.
titleStmt.author: Skippon, Philip, d. 1660.
England and Wales. Army.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Hanna Allen, at the Crowne in Popes-head-Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
